channel.title: CVE Feed for Reviews.co.uk -- REVIEWS.io

item.title: CVE-2024-38677|2024-08-02T04:12:26.190Z -- reviews.co.uk -- reviews.io
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Reviews.Co.Uk REVIEWS.Io allows Stored XSS.This issue affects REVIEWS.Io: from n/a through 1.2.7.
